description:
Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

developer: Internet Services Polen Sp. z o.o.
description:
Discover the local choice for meals, groceries, and food delivery with foodpanda!

Life can get overwhelming, but we’re here to help! Whether you need daily meals, groceries, or shopping essentials, foodpanda has got you covered with convenient food delivery.

Order Your Favourite Food with Just 3 Simple Taps!

With foodpanda, you can easily choose the food you love, and we’ll deliver it right to your door. Serving millions across over 400 cities in 11 Asian markets — Singapore, Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, Pakistan, Taiwan, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Laos, Cambodia, and Myanmar — foodpanda is your go-to for everyday food delivery.

Endless Food and Grocery Delivery Choices at Your Fingertips!
Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or fried chicken? We know the best restaurants near you – big famous brands and tiny local faves. Best part? We've got exclusive discounts and promos waiting for all new foodies. With a simple click, your food and groceries are on their way with fast delivery!

Need Groceries? We’ve Got You Covered!
Want to cook but short on time? Imagine having fresh produce, pantry staples, frozen goods, personal care items, your cute pets' needs, and much more, delivered in a flash — everything you need for a hassle-free home-cooked meal, all available through our speedy groceries delivery service from foodpanda shops and pandamarts.

Best Food and Grocery Delivery Deals Just for You!
Looking for the best savings on groceries and food? We regularly update our daily deals, personalised just for you! Here’s a tip: skip the queue and choose self pick-up for extra savings on your grocery orders, or enjoy the convenience of our food delivery options.

Save on tasty takeaways.
On the go? Try pick-up! Skip the queue and save up when you self-collect your order.

Worry-free package delivery.
Need to send or receive a parcel? Go with pandago. Our reliable fleet and on-demand delivery service will safely deliver it for you in no time.

Our tech is shaped by you.
Explore personalised offers and delicious picks just for you. Dish out what you feel about your order and let foodies know what’s yum. 

Want More? Join pandapro!
Unlock even greater savings on food delivery and grocery options with our pandapro membership today!

Live like a panda and let us take care of the rest — let’s do it the panda way with seamless food delivery!

For more info, please visit our website.

Get rewarded for skipping the queue!

Start earning points by ordering through our App today!

With the CHAGEE App, you can:
-Order and pay digitally
-Order for self-pickup ahead of time
-Earn Points and redeem rewards at our Rewards Store
-Earn Experience to reach higher tiers for greater benefits
-Stay up to date on new launches and deals
-Locate our outlets and their operating hours

Download and enjoy welcome discounts now!

a Necessity, not a Luxury

You deserve the best without breaking the bank. That’s why ZUS Coffee is here to provide specialty handcrafted coffee, hand-delivered to your doorstep. Just sit back, relax and get a quality cup of coffee delivered to you with just a few taps on your phone!

Brought to you by Malaysia #1 Coffee Delivery Brand

 - 100% Arabica Coffee Beans
 - Award-Winning Coffee Plantation at Brazil
 - World’s Top 50 Best Coffee Roastery 
 - Anti-Spillage Cup Lid
 - Exceptional Coffee Delivery Experience

Download now to enjoy Buy 1 Free 1 on your first purchase! :)

Luckin Coffee is a leading new retail coffee chain. We are pioneering a technology-driven new retail model to provide coffee and other products of high quality, high affordability, and high convenience to our customers.
 
High Quality Arabica Beans
We are proud to present you our high-quality Arabica beans. Our coffee beans have won the Gold Medal in the IIAC International Coffee Tasting competition for seven consecutive years.

Blended by the WBC Champions Team
We take great pride in the art of coffee blending. Our team of World Barista Champions hailing from Poland, Italy, Japan, Australia and China have brought their unique expertise and passion to every blend. 

Freshly Roasted, Freshly Grounded
We use high-end equipment such as SCHAERER coffee machines imported from Switzerland. Every cup of our coffee is freshly made just for you, giving you the full depth of flavor and aroma with every sip.

High Quality & High Convenience & High Affordability
Our 100% cashier-less environment ensures a seamless and hassle-free experience. We promote a more convenient and time-saving “new retail” experience.  You can purchase and pick up our coffee products with our mobile app, a refreshing new experience.

Download the APP and order now!

Kenangan Coffee App helps you to save time in getting that high quality coffee everyday. With some additional time (and coffee), you can finish your tasks earlier, have more family time, learn new skills on the internet, or work on a new project. 

Use Kenangan Coffee App to pre-order your favourite coffee in advance and you will be notified once your order is ready. No more queueing with anxiety, stress and uncertainty!

LOCATE NEAREST OUTLET
- the app will help you find the most convenient outlet for you to order.
- Integrated to your maps for easy direction.
- View operational hours of different outlets.

CUSTOM YOUR ORDER
- We have several different combinations of food to complement your coffee experience with Kopi Kenangan.
- Custom each item according to your preference (customizable temperature, size, sugar, ice, toppings, or variants)... everything through the app.

PRE-ORDER
- Set your preferred pickup time in the app to match your busy schedule.
- Your barista will prepare closer to the pickup time to ensure your order is always fresh when you receive it.

CASHLESS PAYMENTS
- Minimize contact and save more time with broad payment options (e-wallets, debit card, credit card) available in the app.

GET NOTIFIED REAL TIME
- For each order progress, you will be notified real time through the app.
- Once your order is ready, you can just go to the outlet to grab the item in the special pickup area (no queue).

EXCLUSIVE APP PROMO
- Enjoy app-only offerings. Limited quota

*only available in selected outlets
**Kenangan Coffee is available in Malaysia & Singapore

Hurry, enjoy finger lickin' good deals from App Exclusive menus to redeeming KFC reward points for instant savings on your orders!

 PESAN LAGI, JIMAT LAGI
Earn points with every order and redeem your KFC Reward Points instantly on your next purchase.

 APP EXCLUSIVE MENU
Exclusive deals just for you on the KFC App. It's not available anywhere else, and not forever. Only on the KFC App, so don't miss out.

 DELIVERY OR TAPAU, SENANG JE 
Whether you're having a busy day or planning for a party, let us know where you are and we'll deliver your KFC favourites. You can also skip the queue and collect your meal from your nearest KFC with Self Collect! 

No matter the occasion, order with the KFC App for meals made fresh daily, just for you!

Experience effortless ordering with our state-of-the-art app, available at your fingertips, anytime and anywhere. Discover a seamless and hassle-free journey as you indulge in your favourite Domino's pizza. Our innovative features are designed to save you precious time and effort, ensuring a stress-free ordering experience. Stay in the loop with our exclusive deals and offers, ensuring you never miss out on the latest savings. Additionally, our app provides real-time order tracking, allowing you to stay updated on the progress of your order, even while on the move.

Guess what? We got a makeover! Check out our revamped features: 

MORE CONVENIENT
- Smoother self pick-up & delivery services 
- In-app wallet for quicker transactions 

EXCLUSIVE TREATS
- FREE birthday drinks
- Instant Tealive Club membership upon signing up

LOYALTY REWARDS
- Monthly challenges to earn points 
- Exciting & exclusive in-app promotions

MyCBTL is available nationwide at all cafés across Peninsular Malaysia, excluding Lot SAT-P-A50, Satellite Building (KLIA) and S1-1A-A02-03 (Gate J), S3-A1-A07 & A08 (Gate K) & S3-2-A09 (Gate L) and Satellite Building (KLIA2)!

Enjoy rewards and personalized specialty coffee and tea experiences. Every order you make now is not only about indulging in our finest brews and creating rewarding moments that count.

Here's what to love - 
• Exclusive rewards: Every purchase earns you Bean Points to redeem for exclusive rewards. 
• Exclusive privileges: Get access to welcome treats, birthday treats and more as a MyCBTL member.
• Order ahead: Order your favorite coffee, tea, ice blended and food while on the move and pick it up in our cafés nearest to you with ease!
• Re-order: Order again in just a few taps. 
• Cashless payments: Pay securely and conveniently through the app.

For a limited time only, enjoy a free drink on us and earn bonus Bean Points when you download the app and become a MyCBTL member today!

• Earn Unlimited Smile Points on every plate – the more you dine, the more you earn.
• Redeem your points and stamps for unlimited freebies, vouchers, and treats.
• Celebrate your birthday with 200 Smile Points and a dessert – rewards that make your day feel unlimited.
• Unlock unlimited access to app-only deals, early promos, and member perks.
• Join over 1,000,000 Malaysians enjoying the unlimited joy of sushi, rewards, and smiles.

Welcome to the Pizza Hut Malaysia Mobile Ordering App! 
Craving for some delicious pizzas? Download the Pizza Hut App now and order your favorite pizzas with us, hassle-free!

BENEFITS OF OUR PIZZA HUT APP

1.QUICK & EASYWe’ve designed the app to make it so much easier for you to order your pizzas. Less time, less hassle and more time to enjoy with your loved ones!

2.EARN REWARDS with HUT REWARDSMake every bite more rewarding! Collect your digital Hut Rewards pizza slices each time you order with us (1 slice for every RM30 spend) and use them to redeem FREE food on your next purchase. More slices, more rewards! *T&C Apply*

3.MY COUPONS! You Download, We Belanja! Download the Pizza Hut Mobile App and we’ll reward you with a Buy 1 Free 1 promotion on your first login! *For a limited time only*

Download the Pizza Hut App now!

Deals, payment, cashback, and rewards—your lifestyle companion all in one app.

Save with Fave.

• FaveDeals: Save up to 90% with amazing deals on food, spas, massages, staycations, and more!
• FavePay: Go cashless and earn up to 20% cashback at 40,000 Fave-ourite places across Malaysia, Singapore & Indonesia! Just link your card or e-wallet. It's fast, easy, and secure.
• Fave eCards: Earn instant bonus cashback when you buy eCards and spend them flexibly using FavePay. They're like gift cards, but better!

Triple the rewards.

Earn even more rewards with the Fave app! Stack your rewards by getting exclusive cashback and discounts on Fave, then link your preferred e-wallet or credit card to score extra points and benefits upon checkout! Voilà, it’s a triple win! 

Need help? Get in touch with us at hello@myfave.com.

If you have a business and are looking to acquire more customers through deals or loyalty and rewards in our mobile payment solution, let us know at partners@myfave.com today!

NEW APP, MORE REWARDS!
Discover a world of premium teas and exclusive offers with BEUTEA. Whether you're craving a refreshing drink, a classic milk tea, or something new, BEUTEA brings premium flavours right to your fingertips.

•⁠  ⁠Seamless Ordering: Skip the line and order ahead for Pickup or Delivery. Customize your drinks just the way you like them!
•⁠  ⁠Earn Points & Redeem Rewards: Earn points with every purchase and redeem exclusive discounts, freebies and promotions.
•⁠  ⁠Exclusive Birthday Treat: Celebrate your special day with a complimentary birthday drink, available only for BEUTEA Club members.
•⁠  ⁠Location Finder: Find the nearest BEUTEA outlet and explore the menu in your area.

Download now to enjoy Buy 1 Free 1 Welcome Drink and RM15 Welcome Vouchers!

developer: Secret Recipe Cakes & Cafe Sdn. Bhd.
description:
We have upgraded our Secret Recipe Rewards Membership Programme to give you EXCITING benefits & MORE Rewards.
 
Membership Benefits:
Earn points and earn your way up from Member, Super Fan to Sweet Elite!
Enjoy benefits like 3x points rewards, birthday gift, surprise rewards and invitation to exclusive events.
 
Refer A Friend:
Refer a friend and get 300 points each!
(750 points = RM5 Cash Voucher)
 
Download now to enjoy sweeter perks with SR Rewards.

Experience Everyday Great Coffee, made even greater with the Gigi Coffee app.

Designed for coffee lovers who want more than just great taste, the app brings exclusive convenience, rewards, and perks right to your fingertips.

* Save RM1 on every cup, every day—no codes needed
* New users get a warm welcome with Buy 1 Free 1
* Order ahead and skip the queue at any of our 150+ outlets
* Check in daily to earn points and unlock special perks
* Enjoy a free birthday drink, member rewards, and app-only offers
* Verified students and corporate users enjoy extra privileges
* Track your purchases and pay securely with your in-app wallet

Sourced from world-renowned coffee bean boutiques, Gigi Coffee uses 100% Premium Arabica coffee beans that go through stringent quality control procedures. At Gigi Coffee, we are passionate and committed to bring the best brews to you, both in terms of value and quality!
All our coffee beans are certified with ISO22000, HACCP and Halal.

Proudly brewed in Malaysia, Gigi Coffee is more than just a drink—it's part of your lifestyle. Fuel your mornings, power your workdays, and add joy to your everyday moments with a cup that’s crafted to inspire.

Whether you’re picking up your usual or discovering something new, the Gigi Coffee app makes it faster, smarter, and more rewarding.

Download today and make every cup count.

The fastest way to enjoy Starbucks – Scan, Pay, and Go!
 
Get the best of Starbucks Rewards at your fingertips.
 
With the Starbucks Malaysia Mobile App, you can:
- Make payment with Starbucks Card
- Reload Starbucks Card online
- Track rewards progress and check validity
- Register or add new Starbucks Card
- Report lost or stolen Starbucks Card
- View transaction history
- Transfer card balance (within same account)
- Stay updated on the latest in-store promotions
- Find and locate nearest Starbucks store
- Mobile Order & Pay (self-pickup)
- Mobile Order to Table (sit back and order from your table)
- In-app Rewards Redemption (more choices, more rewards)
- Scan & Pay (earn stars however you pay)

developer: Shenzhen Meixixi Catering Management Co., Ltd.
description:
The official HEYTEA Go app is now launched! Order HEYTEA online, choose from a rich variety of drink categories, customize your HEYTEA and easily locate your nearest HEYTEA stores on. Log in to HEYTEA Go now and embark on a whole new tea-drinking experience.

1. Order Online
Order on your mobile phone, skip the queue and collect your HEYTEA when ready. Get notifications on new drink launches and the latest activites.

2. Track Your Order
Check order status in real-time.

3. Personalise your HEYTEA
Choose your favourite HEYTEA drinks with your favorite toppings and preferences. Get a cup of HEYTEA that is trully your own. 

4. Store Locator
Navigate the area around you and locate the nearest HEYTEA store to your location.

Inside Scoop started as a dream to make genuinely fresh ice cream for Malaysians.

Our goal was simple, to create great-tasting premium ice cream with Malaysians in mind.
Starting at Bangsar in late 2013 with only 16 flavours, including our best sellers Durian, Valrhona Chocolate and Teh Tarik.
Now we've grown over 40+ stores across Malaysia and growing.

Join the Insiders Club today and be rewarded with Perks!

Earn Points 
- Earn 1 point for every RM1 spent.
- Every 100 points, you're entitled to a RM5 Reward!

Birthday Treat 
- Buy 1 Free 1 ice cream on your birthday month!

Welcome Treat 
- 20% OFF Total bill

Get the Inside Scoop 
- First dibs on our new flavours, exclusive members-only events, and deals!

myllaollaoClub is a loyalty app to offer you more benefits, exclusive promotions and deals. Collect points every time when you visit us to receive free froyos and gift vouchers! Simply because you deserve more.

Introducing the Baskin-Robbins Malaysia Rewards app – every trip to Baskin-Robbins now is a little bit sweeter with our brand new grab-and-go ice cream experience and awesome member exclusive deals!

Be the first to find out the latest news and earn loyalty points with every purchase at our stores. Enjoy the flavourful journey of unlocking 3 membership levels for better treats! 
Upon first download, enjoy 2 free scoops of ice cream - one for you and one for your loved one! What are you waiting for?

Earn Loyalty Rewards
Join our Club 31 and earn a point for every RM1 you spend or accelerate the fun by completing missions. Upon levelling up, you will unlock more 31derful offers and enjoy better perks every year!

Order Online & Pick Up 
Be it last minute craving or order ahead to save time on celebration day, you can now skip the queue and secure your favourite flavour or cake design with our in-app ordering! Happiness is literally at your fingertips!
 
Enjoy Exclusive Deals
Get access to member-only, time-limited coupons and promotions, specially tailored for you right from the app!

Make Someone Happy
You are not the only one who screams for ice cream! You can now surprise someone by sending a scoop of happiness or share your coupons! Level up to spread more love!

Extraordinary Birthday Treat
Receive a birthday gift from us on your birthday. The best part is you will enjoy the best birthday gift ever upon reaching the highest level!

Locate a Store
Whether you're looking for a scoop of goodness to wind down your day, or having a fun day out with your friends and family, finding the closest Baskin-Robbins is always a tap away!

Stay Happy, Live Flavourfully!

About this app

All your Marrybrown exclusive deals and rewards in one app. Download today to get your new member deal and start enjoying the perks! 

Collect MB Reward Stamps
- Collect MB Reward Stamps when you spend at Marrybrown and redeem delicious treats!

Earn MB Reward Points
- Accumulate MB Reward Points every time you indulge in our meals and unlock exciting treats! Receive 1 MB Point for every RM1 spent.

Exclusive MB Deals
- Savour your favourite MB Meals with our app-exclusive deals – saving money while satisfying your cravings!

New Member Deal and Birthday Deal
- Birthdays: Be treated to a delightful birthday surprise during your special month!
- Experience a warm welcome with a complimentary 1-pc MB Crispy Chicken when you join the MB App for the first time!

Effortless Ordering
- Mobile Ordering is always available whether you are ordering for dine-in, takeaway, delivery or drive-in. Place your order hassle-free and effortlessly using the MB App.

Stay updated 
- Keep yourself in the loop with the latest updates and exclusive promotions from Marrybrown on the MB App!

Plan Memorable Moments
- Reach out to us for seamless event planning, whether it's a birthday party or catering services.
- Let us handle the details while you relax and enjoy!

To Discover, To Satisfy 
Discover the world of specialty coffee like never before, satisfy your curiosity and your taste buds with HWC Coffee. Let us take you on a coffee adventure you‘ll never forget.

Our Brand
Malaysia First Specialty Coffee Chai
Only Serve Specialty Coffee 
High Quality Coffee with Affordable Price
                          
Our House Blend - HWC Classic No 9  
100% Arabica 
Rated as 91-Point Specialty Coffee by Coffee Review
Rich chocolate, nutty aroma, accompanied by grape and blackcurrant fruit notes.

Receive or Redeem E-voucher.

Introducing the all new neighbourhood membership app with whole new experience for our members! Earn points and exclusive rewards within this app and unlock additional benefits. 

FREE TO JOIN
Simply download and register an account with us

EARN POINTS AND REWARDS
1. Flash your app when you made a purchase in any emart24 stores. 
2. Get member's price, offers and bonus points*.
3. Earn rewards via digital stamps*.

Never miss out on collecting Boost points with the Boost Juice app! Use your phone in place of your plastic loyalty card – just scan your unique barcode every time you purchase and your points will accumulate. Reach 10 points and you can redeem your freebie via your phone using the scanners in store. Take the weight off your wallet, use the new Boost app and ditch the plastic!

· Customise your orders
· Build your own juice
· Australia wide store locator
· Manage and track your Boost Points
and a whole bunch more.
